room_title: Escape room "Descent Into Madness" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: The Descent into Madness was super creepy! Totally articulate with every clue. A great hours worth of fun with a terrific staff.

room_title: Escape room "Descent Into Madness" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: My team of 6 had a blast in the Descent into Madness room. Effects were well executed. Puzzles were challenging but not impossible. We had a fantastic time and we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Descent Into Madness" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: We had a great time doing the Decent Into Madness room for my husband's birthday! It was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Descent Into Madness" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: The owner was extremely nice and explained everything well. The Decent into Madness was designed and decorated authentically. It was a lot of fun. After we were done we got to sit and play a trivia game as well. Definitely worth the money!!

room_title: Escape room "Descent Into Madness" by Escape Reality Games in Sarasota
review: This was the best escape room we've ever done. We did the "Descent into Madness" room, which was just immaculately executed. The minute you step into the room you are transported into another reality. The design perfectly sets the mood, the story is exciting, and there are some very cool elements that will blow you away.Once you're out of the room, there's lots more to do at Escape Reality - they have tons of puzzles to play with, a costume room to take silly photos, games and food.
